title: Best of the Program | Guests: Pat Gray & Jeff Fisher | 1/3/20
description:
What's next after what happened in Iraq? The U.N. has to go away, and the only person who can make that a reality is President Trump. Texas is slowly turning purple. Alex Jones is back in the news! Let's be honest here: Social media's algorithms are hurting the Right, not the Left. Judge rules that a baby's life support can be turned off against the parents' wishes. Some good news for the Impossible Burger!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
